animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am gray and very large.
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I purr when I am happy.
🐈‍⬛ I have whiskers and soft fur.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I hatch from an egg.
🦆 I have webbed feet.
🍞 People sometimes feed me bread.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots on my body.
🌿 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia.
💪 I have strong legs for jumping.
🥊 I am known to box.

animal.question: I roar and I'm known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
👑 I am a symbol of courage.
🥩 I am a carnivore.

animal.question: I'm a black and white animal, with stripes all over. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each individual.
🌾 I graze on grass.
🐎 I am related to horses.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am very slow.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce and other greens.
🏠 I can pull my head into my shell.

animal.question: I fly at night and use echolocation to find my way. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I sleep upside down.
🌙 Some of my species eat fruit, while others eat insects.
🦸 Some people think I am spooky.

animal.question: I'm a colorful bird that can mimic human speech. What am I?

hints.text: 🦜 I can live for a very long time.
🍎 I eat seeds, nuts, and fruits.
🗣️ I can learn to say words and phrases.

food.question: I am yellow and curved. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
💛 My skin is a bright color.
🐒 I'm a favorite snack for primates.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me in a glass or pour me on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Baby cows drink me from their mothers.
🦴 I help make your bones strong.
🥣 I often go well with cookies and cereal.

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on trees and am known to keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate a poisoned one of me
🌱 I start as a flower
🥧 You can make a pie with me

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
👀 Eating me can help you see better.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me.

food.question: I am made of grains. You can spread butter and jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often served with soup.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.
🌾 I am made in an oven from a flour-like substance.

food.question: I am cold and sweet. I come in many flavors and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt in the sun.
🍨 I am delicious on a hot day.
🌈 You can put sprinkles on me.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. I am green inside and sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have small, black seeds you can eat.
🌿 My skin is brown and has small hairs.
🇨🇳 I am originally from China.

food.question: I am made from tomatoes, onions, and peppers. I often come with tortilla chips. What am I?

hints.text: 🌶️ I can be mild or spicy.
🍅 My main ingredient is a red fruit that people often think is a vegetable.
🇲🇽 I am very popular in Mexican cuisine.

food.question: I am a type of mushroom that grows underground and is very expensive. Chefs shave me over pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🐷 Pigs and dogs are used to find me.
🇫🇷 I am a delicacy in France and Italy.
💎 I am sometimes called the 'diamond of the kitchen'.

food.question: I am a drink made from roasted beans. Many adults drink me in the morning to wake up. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I can be served hot or iced.
🌱 My beans grow on trees in warm climates.
😴 People drink me when they're feeling sleepy.
